queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name WITH n MATCH p=(n)<-[r:MemberOf*1..]-(m) RETURN p

queries.name: Find Shortest Paths to Domain Admins

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH (n:User),(m:Group {name:$result}),p=shortestPath((n)-[r:{}*1..]->(m)) RETURN p

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH (n1)-[:MemberOf|GetChanges*1..]->(u:Domain {name: $result}) WITH n1,u MATCH (n1)-[:MemberOf|GetChangesAll*1..]->(u) WITH n1,u MATCH p = (n1)-[:MemberOf|GetChanges|GetChangesAll*1..]->(u) RETURN p

queries.name: Users with Foreign Domain Group Membership

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH (n:User) WITH n MATCH (m:Group) WITH n,m MATCH p=(n)-[r:MemberOf]->(m) WHERE n.domain=$result AND NOT m.domain=n.domain RETURN p

queries.name: Groups with Foreign Domain Group Membership

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH (n:Group) WITH n MATCH (m:Group) WITH n,m MATCH p=(n)-[r:MemberOf]->(m) WHERE n.domain=$result AND NOT m.domain=n.domain AND NOT n.name=m.name RETURN p
MATCH p=(n:Domain)-[r]-(m:Domain) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Unconstrained Delegation Systems

queryList.query: MATCH (m:Computer) WHERE m.unconstraineddelegation=true MATCH (n) MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[r:{}*1..]->(m)) WHERE NOT m=n RETURN p

queryList.title: Select a domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

queryList.title: Select a user
queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.domain=$result AND n.hasspn=true RETURN n.name, n.pwdlastset ORDER BY n.pwdlastset ASC
MATCH n=shortestPath((a:User {name:$result})-[r:{}*1..]->(b:Computer)) RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Domain Admins from Kerberoastable Users

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH (n:User),(m:Group {name:$result}),p=shortestPath((n)-[r:{}*1..]->(m)) WHERE n.hasspn=true RETURN p

queryList.title: Select a domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

queryList.title: Select a user
queryList.query: MATCH (n) WHERE n.domain=$result AND n.owned=true RETURN n.name, n.PwdLastSet ORDER BY n.PwdLastSet ASC
MATCH n=shortestPath((a {name:$result})-[r:{}*1..]->(b:Computer)) RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Domain Admins from Owned Principals

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH (n),(m:Group {name:$result}),p=shortestPath((n)-[r:{}*1..]->(m)) WHERE n.owned=true RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to High Value Targets

queryList.title: Select a Domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH (n),(m),p=shortestPath((n)-[r:{}*1..]->(m)) WHERE m.domain=$result AND m.highvalue=true AND NOT m = n RETURN p
